title: Aural set, Tibetan song - phrase structure

content.question: The phrase structure of part 1 is best diagrammed as

choices.label: a b c a b c
a b c a' b' c'
a a b a a b
a a b c c d

content.answer: a a b c c d

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
